patthana14.8:1.1_0: Anidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.8:1.1_1: Anidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.8:1.1_2: Anidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassano ca naanidassano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
